text: f'in raddak allah -ayha alrswl- min ghzwtk 'iilaa jamaeat min almunafiqin althabtyn ealaa alnfaq, fastadhanuk lilkhuruj maeak 'iilaa ghzwt 'ukhraa baed ghzw (tbwk) faqul lhm: lan takhrujuu maei abdana fi ghzwt min alghzwat, walan tuqatiluu maei edwana min alaeda'; 'iinakum raditum bialqueud 'awal mrt, faqeuduu mae aladhin tkhlfu ean aljhad mae rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm
